5 // <summary>
6 // Convert a boolean to a <see cref="Visibility"/>.Hidden/.Visible property
7 // </summary>
8 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9 
10 using System.Windows.Media;
11 
12 namespace Fasetto.Word
13 {
14  using System;
15  using System.Globalization;
16 
17  /// <inheritdoc/>
18  /// <summary>
19  /// Convert a RGB String to a <see cref="SolidColorBrush"/> property
20  /// </summary>
21  public class StringRgbToBrushConverter : BaseValueConverter<StringRgbToBrushConverter>
22  {
23  #region Public Methods
24 
25  /// <inheritdoc/>
26  /// <summary>
27  /// Convert false to hidden and true to visible
28  /// </summary>
29  /// <param name="value">The boolean value</param>
30  /// <param name="targetType">What control to target</param>
31  /// <param name="parameter">Any parameters passed</param>
32  /// <param name="culture">The language culture</param>
33  /// <returns>The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Visibility"/>. value</returns>
34  public override object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)
35  {
36  return (SolidColorBrush)(new BrushConverter().ConvertFrom($"#{value}"));
37  }
38 
39  /// <inheritdoc/>
40  /// <summary>
41  /// Convert the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Visibility"/> back to a boolean value
42  /// </summary>
43  /// <param name="value">The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Visibility"/> value</param>
44  /// <param name="targetType">The TargetType of the action to target</param>
45  /// <param name="parameter">Any parameters passed</param>
46  /// <param name="culture">The language culture</param>
47  /// <returns>The <see cref="T:System.Boolean"/> value of this property</returns>
48  /// <exception cref="T:System.NotImplementedException">
49  /// We have not implemented this yet
50  /// </exception>
51  public override object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)
52  {
53  throw new NotImplementedException();
54  }
55 
56  #endregion Public Methods
57  }
58 }
